title: FS/FT: T205 Scanlan with Piedmont 42 back - $SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T205 Scanlan with Piedmont 42 back - $SOLD
posts.post_content:
Ok, totally honest.....I don't know much about T205's. I have this Scanlan T205  with a Piedmont 42 back.  $SOLD shipped.  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=291700&d=1508514909[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=291701&d=1508514919[/IMG]
In that condition I would say closer to $40 would be market.  That is only because of the back otherwise maybe a $10-$15 card.
